credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Laforet Museum Harajuku
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Red and yellow background with cartoon-like illustrations. In center, a cruise ship on the ocean with a purple woman above. In bottom right, a red cliff with eyes and a gaping mouth which is actually a cave. In top left, blue and white Japanese characters frame a red skull and cross bones.
name: Poster
